item.title: Copying Directory Structure With a Bash Script - With Help From ChatGPT AI
item.description: Introduction In this post we’ll create a Bash command for copying the directory structure of one directory into another directory using a Bash script - and we’ll use ChatGPT to generate the script. ChatGPT Conversation Our Prompt Write a Bash command to recursively copy the directory structure of one directory to another directory. ChatGPT’s Response To recursively copy just the directory structure (without copying the actual files), you can use the `find` command in combination with `mkdir -p` and some text manipulation.
